windows.name: ping
windows.description: Tests connectivity to another host and measures round-trip time.

parameters.name: -t
parameters.description: Pings the specified host until stopped with CTRL+C.

parameters.name: -a
parameters.description: Resolves addresses to hostnames.

parameters.name: -n
parameters.description: Specifies the number of echo requests to send.

parameters.name: -l
parameters.description: Specifies the send buffer size in bytes.

parameters.name: -f
parameters.description: Sets the Do Not Fragment flag in the packet.

parameters.name: -i
parameters.description: Specifies the TTL (Time To Live) for packets.

parameters.name: -v
parameters.description: Specifies Type of Service (TOS) value.

parameters.name: -r
parameters.description: Records the route for the specified number of hops.

parameters.name: -s
parameters.description: Timestamps for the specified number of hops.
Forces IPv4.
Forces IPv6.

windows.name: tracert
windows.description: Displays the route packets take to a network host.

parameters.name: -d
parameters.description: Do not resolve addresses to hostnames.

parameters.name: -h
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of hops.

parameters.name: -j
parameters.description: Loose source route along the host-list.

parameters.name: -w
parameters.description: Wait timeout in milliseconds for each reply.
Forces IPv4.
Forces IPv6.

windows.name: pathping
windows.description: Combines ping and tracert to show packet loss at each router between source and destination.

parameters.name: -n
parameters.description: Do not resolve addresses to hostnames.

parameters.name: -h
parameters.description: Maximum number of hops to search for target.

parameters.name: -g
parameters.description: Loose source route along the host-list.

parameters.name: -p
parameters.description: Wait period between pings (ms).

parameters.name: -q
parameters.description: Number of queries per hop.

windows.name: ipconfig
windows.description: Displays IP configuration information for all network interfaces.

parameters.name: /all
parameters.description: Displays full configuration information.

parameters.name: /release
parameters.description: Releases the IP address for the specified adapter.

parameters.name: /renew
parameters.description: Renews the IP address for the specified adapter.

parameters.name: /flushdns
parameters.description: Flushes the DNS resolver cache.

parameters.name: /displaydns
parameters.description: Displays the contents of the DNS resolver cache.

parameters.name: /registerdns
parameters.description: Refreshes all DHCP leases and re-registers DNS names.

windows.name: netstat
windows.description: Displays network connections, routing tables, and interface statistics.

parameters.name: -a
parameters.description: Displays all active connections and listening ports.

parameters.name: -n
parameters.description: Displays addresses and port numbers numerically.

parameters.name: -o
parameters.description: Displays the owning process ID for each connection.

parameters.name: -b
parameters.description: Displays the executable involved in creating each connection or listening port.

parameters.name: -r
parameters.description: Displays the routing table.

parameters.name: -e
parameters.description: Displays Ethernet statistics.

windows.name: arp
windows.description: Displays and modifies entries in the Address Resolution Protocol cache.

parameters.name: -a
parameters.description: Displays the current ARP table.

parameters.name: -d
parameters.description: Deletes an entry from the ARP cache.

parameters.name: -s
parameters.description: Adds a static ARP entry.

windows.name: nslookup
windows.description: Queries DNS to obtain domain name or IP address mapping.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: Specifies an alternate DNS server to query.

parameters.name: -type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of DNS record to query (A, MX, CNAME, etc.).

windows.name: getmac
windows.description: Displays the MAC address of all network adapters.

parameters.name: /v
parameters.description: Displays verbose output.

parameters.name: /fo
parameters.description: Specifies output format: TABLE, LIST, CSV.

parameters.name: /s
parameters.description: Specifies the remote system to connect to.

parameters.name: /u
parameters.description: Specifies the user context.

parameters.name: /p
parameters.description: Specifies the password for the given user context.

windows.name: netsh
windows.description: Configures network interfaces, firewall, routing, and other network settings.

parameters.name: interface
parameters.description: Specifies an interface to configure.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: Configures IP settings.

parameters.name: firewall
parameters.description: Configures firewall settings.

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: Displays settings or configuration.

parameters.name: set
parameters.description: Sets specified parameters for network configuration.

windows.name: telnet
windows.description: Communicates with a remote host using the TELNET protocol.

windows.name: ftp
windows.description: Transfers files to and from a remote computer using the FTP protocol.

windows.name: tftp
windows.description: Transfers files to and from a remote host using the trivial FTP protocol.

parameters.name: -i
parameters.description: Uses binary (image) transfer mode.
